name: Neon - STRK
description:
Controls:

-/ Hit up: J or V

-/ Hit down: F or N

-/ Long: Hold the corresponding key for up or down

Aid Yuna Montenegro in her fight against neoliberal capitalism. Slice through enemies in this frenetic rythm based game.

This game was made for the Rythm Jam, where the theme was Every _____. We decided to implement this in the form of Every enemy spawns to the rythm. It can also be thought of as Every level a different color, Every color a different song and Every song a different beat.
